title: Calculate the Hypotenuse
description:
HYPOT The Mortgage function calculates the hypotenuse of a right triangle, by
the theorem of Pythagoras.
name: HYPOT

input.name: X
input.description: The length of one side of the right triangle.

input.name: Y
input.description: The length of the other side of the right triangle.

return_value.description: The calculated length of the hypotenuse.
